item.title: 开启oracle的闪回功能
item.description: 查看是否开启闪回 1 2 3 4 5 SQL> select flashback_on from v$database; FLASHBACK_ON ------------------ NO 查看是否配置了db_recover_file_dest 1 2 3 4 5 6 SQL> show parameter db_recovery NAME TYPE VALUE ------------------------------------ ----------- ------------------------------ db_recovery_file_dest string db_recovery_file_dest_size big integer 0
